name: Figure1.11
title: Figure1.11
description:
Where there were breaks in series, such as during World War 2 in Former Soviet Union and South Korea, data has been linearly interpolated to create an annual series for each country.

2011-2015 data (and 2009-2010 for Botsawa) was calculated by splicing Bolt, van Zanden (2013) and 'The 2015 Total Economy Database'. All the other data was taken from Bolt, van Zanden (2013).

sources.name: Bolt, van Zanden (2013) and 'The 2015 Total Economy Database'
sources.dataPublishedBy: Jutta Bolt and Jan Juiten van Zanden (2013) ‘The First Update of the Maddison Project Re-Estimating Growth Before 1820’ - Maddison Project Working Paper WP-4 (January); Conference Board - 'The 2015 Total Economy Database'
sources.additionalInfo:
Where there were breaks in series, such as during World War 2 in Former Soviet Union and South Korea, data has been linearly interpolated to create an annual series for each country.

2011-2015 data (and 2009-2010 for Botsawa) was calculated by splicing Bolt, van Zanden (2013) and 'The 2015 Total Economy Database'. All the other data was taken from Bolt, van Zanden (2013).
